keyword: calories in kentucky fried chicken tenders
title: Calories in Kentucky Fried Chicken Tenders
meta_description: Discover calories in Kentucky Fried Chicken tenders for a standard 3-piece serving, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for your meal.
h1: Calories in Kentucky Fried Chicken Tenders
assumptions: KFC original recipe, breaded and fried chicken tenders; standard size (~56g each); 3-piece serving; no dipping sauce or sides.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe updates, portion size, and frying method. Check KFC's official app or site for the most current values.

quick_answer.text: A 3-piece serving of KFC chicken tenders provides 390 kcal and 36 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp honey mustard sauce per tender

faqs.q: How many calories in one Kentucky Fried Chicken tender?
faqs.a: About 130 kcal per single KFC chicken tender.

faqs.q: What is the protein in KFC tenders?
faqs.a: A 3-piece serving has 36 g protein; per tender, 12 g.

faqs.q: Are calories in Kentucky Fried Chicken tenders high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 3 tenders contain 1,680 mg sodium due to breading and seasoning.

faqs.q: How do carbs factor into KFC tenders calories?
faqs.a: 3 tenders have 24 g carbs, mostly from the breading, contributing to the 390 kcal total.

faqs.q: Does adding sauce change calories in KFC tenders?
faqs.a: Yes, one packet of sauce adds 30â€“50 kcal per serving; adjust based on type.
